response.overview: Journey into the unknown as we examine society from the outside looking in. Diary of a psycho is an eerie mesmerising look in to the everyday reality that surrounds us. have you ever wondered what that quiet co-worker does on their off time?  chances are he or she has a secret like the rest of us. experience first hand as you the viewer become a voyeur. sometimes a glimpse in to other people's lives is just to REEL to resist...
response.title: Diary of a Psycho
